title: o48o
author: o48o
created_time: December 31, 2022, 11:57:22 PMLast edit: May 25, 2023, 12:02:22 PM by o48o
content: So i have this twitter account, made in 2019, and now and would like to sell it. Handle is @nftcollector, I never asked for followers or tried to gain them, i am a lazy tweeter and i assume that people keep following me just because of my handle It's followed by BoredApeYC and SuperRare to name a few and i am not selling it under $2k $300 + Escrow feePm me, or reply in here if you are newb and can't pm use pm in twitter or msg me in telegram, my nick is @Defenro.I accept bitcoin, usdt, mature top martketcap altcoins and some relevant nfts as a payment. We can discuss about nfts in pm.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Ok i still like nfts but am hating twitter because of Elon now so i am dropping price to 300$ + escrow fees. Also i am annoyed how @nftcollector gets tagged to tons of posts out there, and i don't have to use that account for bounties and i dislike doing any influental promotions with it. So buy it if you think twitter is only going up and NFTs are here to stay.
